name: Space Helper Guy 2D
description:
This is my 2D Platformer project for Coursera. Have fun!

Added design modifications:

  • Completely new story
  • Friendly NPCs
  • Text triggers
  • Zones with low gravity

Added visual modifications:

  • New models of lifeboats

Added code modifications:

  • Text triggers on the character and NPCs
  • Gravity changers
